page.title: 05Religion in Arundel
page.content: The{Anglican}parish church is St. Nicholas. Every Sunday there are three services, Holy Communion at 8 a.m. (about 30 attend),"Sung Eucharist for the Family" at 10 a.m. (about 120 congregation,a choir and creche for babies) and Evensong at 4 p.m. (7 p.m. in summer). The{Roman Catholic}Cathedral, high on the hill looks down over the town. There are weekday services at 10 a.m.,a vigil service on Saturday and three Masses on Sunday, at 8 a.m., 9.30 a.m. and 11 a.m.(sung). The festival of Corpus Christi is celebrated annually with a carpet of flowers in the aisle of the Cathedral. The{Baptist}church has an average Sunday morning attendance of 45, many from the nearby old people's home. It has a Pastor and Deacons.
